description.description: The public description of the WAF rule.
description.example: SQL injection prevention for SELECT statements

group.description: The rule group to which the current WAF rule belongs.

id.description: The unique identifier of the rule group.

name.description: The name of the rule group.

id.description: The unique identifier of the WAF rule.

package_id.description: The unique identifier of a WAF package.

priority.description: The order in which the individual WAF rule is executed within its rule group.
